CreateDB_SQL
CreateTable_SQL
func:
var sqlQuery = `CREATE TABLE iot.status (
    timestamp VARCHAR(45) PRIMARY KEY,
    email VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
    mac VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
    temp FLOAT NOT NULL,
    humi FLOAT NOT NULL,
    in00 INT NOT NULL,
    in01 INT NOT NULL,
    in02 INT NOT NULL,
    in03 INT NOT NULL,
    out00 INT NOT NULL,
    out01 INT NOT NULL,
    out02 INT NOT NULL,
    out03 INT NOT NULL
);`;

msg.topic = sqlQuery;
msg.payload = {};  // 쿼리에 매개변수가 없다면 빈 객체 전달

return msg;
